snippet.title: Mega Man X for sm64ex-coop (v1.0 RELEASE)
snippet.description:
https://mods.sm64coopdx.com/mods/mega-man-x.167/

F.A.Q:
-Q: How do I play this?
-A: You need to download coop-compiler https://github.com/coop-compiler/coop-compiler/releases Simply add the rom there and it will build the executable automatically

-Q: Can this be played without multiplayer?
-A: Yes, you can simply "Host" a private game when launching sm64ex-coop

-Q: Is there Android support?
-A: There is an Android version of sm64ex-coop but it has some troubles with loading mp3 or BASS audio. Therefore, this version of the mod might break on the Android version. For the 1.1 release, there will be a soundless version of the mod. Additionally, you can check the repository of the Android port for the current progress regarding audio files https://github.com/robertkirkman/sm64ex-coop/issues/2

-Q: Is this PC port only?
-A: Currently yes, specifically sm64ex-coop. the entire mod is written in Lua which is not exactly the same the decompiled C code of the game. But I do have some plans in the future to make a full romhack out of this for n64 emulators. The assets that matter the most (animations, models) can be ported easily. But this won't be done anytime soon. You can join the sm64ex-coop Discord server for more info if you need it https://discord.gg/nWSCg8ZG

Music used: Mega Man X Legacy Collection Soundtrack - 16 RE; FUTURE ver. 1 (Instrumental)
